values: Oh boy. Im home guys. I was offically transfered to 2 hospitals. I left a little early as i needed alot more care for myself and i could not get the medical attention at the place i was at. I am scared to be home but so happy to see everyone, especially my wonderful husband who i missed every second of the day.. I am doing a little better. I am now following a meal plan and am doing my best to eat the food on my plate  My health is a little better as i have some more energy. My weight is still the same but i will learn slowly to gain a bit at a time. The programme was really good as far as eating disorder programmes go, however my BDD/OCD was far to distracting for me to benefit soley from it. I am now seeking further care outside of it and am continuing to do all that i can to continue to fight. I cannot thank my friends who took the time to write and send me adorable gifts. Every single letter made me well up, every package brightened my day. I got countless letters that i wish i could reply to all, please pm if you sent one so i can put name to package! I cannot express my thankyou's in writing..I am so blessed to have you all in my life. Its people like you who help me keep my head held high..You are my angels.. I missed all my customers so much and i am excited to be back and working (not toooo hard though!) and bringing you cute designer bits and bobs! Missed you all terribly.. Thankyou again and again. My recovery is that much easier because of each and every one of you. I will not let this beat me. I will fight so hard over and over for every bit of life it stole from me i will live twice as full  Love you all millions.. All my love, zee xo

Please... If you would like to write to me while im in the hospital..  Please feel free to send me things, like letters, cards, packages...Anything! I'll be lonely..It would make my day!  My address will be at:

Lynsey Leigh-Haddock
2556 La Costa Ave 
Carlsbad, CA 92009

It will make me smile huge....:D   xo

As of tommorow, saturday March 10th, i will be heading to a hospital in LA to continue my long road to recovery from my anorexia nervosa. I will be away for a minimum of 2 months.
This is the most scary, frightening, challenging and hardest things i have ever had to put myself through and i am doing it to learn the truth to my life..Learn how to wake up with a smile and let go of those demons that control me. 11 years now and i have forgotten to live life as it was meant. Each day has become just another day to fight, and now i just want to win.. I need to nurture my body, which has taken top much abuse with no rational. I have the most amazing team behind me, including my wonderful parents, friends and my husband, who i have sworn saved my life by finding me.. I could not do this without their love and support. I am really really scared. I am so afraid i feel sick to my stomach. My life has been about punishment and denial, fear and self hatred. I just want to love myself for the honesty and compassion i love others for. With the energy i continue to look for and will hopefully soon find, i want to say thankyou to my creator, and my life, and all the wonderful people and things i have been blessed with, by giving back and offering myself as best as i can be. Its my time, and i am putting on the boxing gloves, ready to fight those demons that make me starve and punish myself. Noone can control my life as best as i, and now its time to prove it. I love you all so much. I thank my customers for being so sweet and caring. I thank the honesty and compassion of my friends online. I will be back soon and selling you more beautiful clothes. Thankyou from the everything inside me.. xo

I had a moment. I was going through my old photos and decided to copy the photos over that made me remember the times I have really enjoyed. The people I have adored who have moved on, living back home or have left the world :( Everyone I have met in my life has had an impact on me and taught me so much about themselves and about myself. I have never regretted any friendships, experiences.. just accepted them as a part of what I needed to grow and become me. My friends have made me. My memories remind me how lucky I have been. How happy I can be. My memories are what makes me wake up in the morning ready to open my eyes and open new doors to people and opportunities. Experiences are memories. memories are experiences. Every single one so powerful in an array of emotions. Learning to feel. Growing up. Becoming.. Knowing I had the blessing of experiencing new, weird and the uncomfortable. Meeting people, Experiencing your nature and now embracing the memories that no one can take away from me.

I am finally becoming strong enough to let go of the past that tortured me, and smile at the past that became me.


Why did we always get into a situation when were together.  My crazy other half. Road trips. Denny's at 4am. New years with spoons. RANCH! Car stalking... :)


A perfect soul.  Missed beauty. Always so funny. Nothing but gentle.  Hilarious.  Best costume. Loved by all of us.  Funeral was heart wrenching. So glad you were in my life. Wish you still were...  RIP our friend Cory xoxo


"cheeky minx" Visiting me at hospital.  Burnt legs! Shanoooo! Retard Bus with one wheel. Warped tour. Absolute sweetie. Helped me survive Remuda. Drove all that way. I cherish my bear and squeeze it tight.  Want you to be happy.  Want you to know I love you so much.  Special. Ghost rape ;) Tongue ring. Crunch Crunch. DUH GUS GUS! Love. Love. Love. xo


Millionaire Pool.  Katie. Multi colored.  Wine.  Slides. Weston <3 Comfort. Deep talks. Katie I love you non stop.  xo


First time in LA. Hilarious. Dog who doesn't stop peeing. Maximus. Roly Poly's in the mall. Funny cafe videos. Universal studios.  ELF!!! :)


Dork. Dork. Dorks. Funny. Comfortable. Hotel. Offspring.  Piggy backs. Denny's.  Impressed.  Worried. Taught me to let go.  No regrets.


My best friend.  Special.  Soul mate. Comfortable. GYP. "Lisa" Shaky hands. Beautiful photos. Blue. Kung Pow! Hollister. Sammy wood fire/pizza. Cashews. 4 min phone calls. Never said I love you.  I love you to death. Always my bestie. xo


MY Twin. Same eyes. CD you made me. "Martin's Bird" Woke up in a car. London. The Ghetto. Tears to Kisses. Dodgy conversations. Hanging out in my room for an entire day. Gummy bears. Trucker hats. Matching nose rings. Connected Through soul. Miss you every time I hear that song...  xo


College mates. Silent bond. Reading. Purple Turtle. Ditching college. Deej. Straws. Buying boxers. Lucy. Drinking milk. Always caring. Loved your personality, real inspiration. Honesty.


Beautiful Mother. Close. Thin wires, but never snap. Proud to hold your hand in public. Adore. Need. Miss being young with you. Always your little girl. Scared to leave. Comfort... My mother. Love overwhelmed.


Always loved you.  Most honest. Most real. Hilarious. Scratching your car. Selling it for $20. Agincourt. Smokin' on the racecourse. Red eyes. Careless inspiration. Learnt. Missed more than most. Silly tattoo. Most sexed up I know. Steamy windows at the horse. Natural punk. Sensitive but shh. Web cam with dreads and mustache [hehehe!] Getting caught! Hangin' out and loving every second of it. Love you more than I told you. Miss Miss Miss....


My Best friend.  Small Hands. Loved my bum. Touched my nipples! Shopping at the edge. H&M. Wearing the tie. Cab rides. Hugh. Hippy purple flares. Cords. Baggy jeans. Fez. Dancing. I miss your hand. I need you here. My sister in another life. Leaving drunken love you note on bathroom door! Bitching in the toilet. Purple Turtle. 10 quid jugs. 'Do I knoooow you?' Hair dye. Wokingham Station. Late. Missed trains. Camden Town. I just started crying.....


I will see you soon. I worry about you all the time.  Inspired by your strength and dependence. Love your personality. Marc. Pictures. Lots of pictures. Always appreciate you rushing me to hospital. Want you to come home. BANG! Your real. A genuine sweetheart and a wonderful friend. Miss our times. Miss having coffee. SO STRONG. Lots of respect. Polka dot dress.  <3


My best friends in London. I remember this.  I was so happy to see you guys again. I was drunk.  Very sad.  Very happy. On top of the world. Osama Scarf! Pictures in the bathroom mirror. Lora.  Fil.  You made memories I cherish day and night. Bracknell. Pikeys. Laughter. The Ghetto. Lora, my girlfriend! Holding hands. TUCs! Being gayer than fil. Trains from waterloo at 6am. Getting on wrong buses. Never stop loving you guys. EVER.


Challenging Fil to gayness at the ghetto.  So much fun. Lots of alcohol. Bisexual shock! In Our ESSENCE. Gwen Stefani. Peaches!! Fixing up. Kissing Neil. Gay icon. Sweaty. Horny. Straight! Damn. Seeing you so happy. Made my world. We couldn't have been gayer. Funny writing on the toilets.  Using the guys. Everyone is fit! Sooo ghetto! ID! Don't end its only 4am! :)


Hawaii.  First time running in a bikini. Rhawnie. Tanless! "WHAT THE F***?" <-- haha.  What 'not' to say.  Guy in cheeseburger. Kissing you more than anyone else! Hotel room.  Hair dye everywhere. Spontaneous. Laughing non stop. Beach when it rains. Drunk 24/7 Sleeping at 8pm! <-- OOPS Waking up and realizing we wasted a night out! "what a waste of 35$" Cute journals.  Mini spirits. Funny plane ride.  UTAH ice!


First friend in CA.  Closeness. Comfort. Compatibility. Jumping on my bed and waking me up. Cuddling during movies. Never getting it on! Being tortured by everyone about it.  Awkwardness but funny. Freezing in your bed because of the fan. Best Halloween costumes.  People change.  We had a chance.  My fault we didn't. take it. No regrets. EVER. Love Love Love always.


Mom, dad and Jon. So proud.  Eating out. Walking miles. Jon and his uk post office top! Beautiful Del Mar. Crazy dad. Young. Beautiful day. Proud.  So happy.  So proud.     My LIFE.


Fish tanks for Katie and Holland.  No fish.  Frogs and those sleeping fishy things.  Funny names. My old room. Scott and his lovely grin! ROSS!! dress for less! Funny tanks.  Unappreciated gifts! HAHA. 'Why you get us that?' Missing the 'fish'. Spending 3 hours in pet smart. Hamster? helping dying bird.  Coloring in pictures at chili's all red.  Funny craigslist ad comment. Starbucks. Shopping. TRUE RELIGION! Amazing human being.


Greg's art work of me.  Spot on. Hilarious conversations. TABOO! All night long.  Crazy yahoo painting for hours.  Web cam fun! Hair messy! ERASING pictures AHH! Naughts and Crosses!! :)


Best Photo Ever.  Kr3W hat! Thanx Dave. Being Ghetto Fabulous.  Bandana and trucker hats! Zip ups. Stretching ears. London train rides. causing trouble.  We were quite the pair. Train arrives. 'shall we run for the train??' discussing for 3 mins.  Decide to run after spending 5 mins discussing! Pikey scum! Worlds End. Bracknell, innit.  MVC. TopShop <3 Walking to your college. Visiting you at work and getting told of! Pizza hut.  <3


Longest relationship.  First, 'love'.  Thanking you for loving me. Drooling and not being embarrassed. Burping and being loved for it. Waking up while your at work and cleaning your room for you. Leaving you notes. Receiving wonderful texts. Wes Borland! haha. Getting your belly pierced.  Tongue ring ;) Star tattoo.. hahahaha! Hating your windbreaker jacket! Making you dye your hair crazy silly colors. 'time of the month' gifts. Free joints. Stealing your vests. 'Missing without you'.  Always appreciate you teaching me I can be loved. No makeup. Waterloo station.  First time.  No regrets. <3


Katie.  Model shoot photo!? BANG! So much fun. Long drive.  DENNY'S! Getting ready.  Giving you my clothes. Drinking to much. Dancing in the hiphop room. Missing those times.


My beautiful angels... Lora, Amy..  The racecourse. Swing sex. stoned. Too many sweets...
 


DREAM PHONE! Best game EVER. Laughing till it HURTS.  My garden.  Better days. Wanting to steal your hat.  Getting nervous about answering the toy phone. 'what do I say??' Actually scared! Laughing at how ugly the guys are.  'Lets go to the cinema!' Getting stoned in the garage.  Smittys funny car.


He knew before anyone.  Loved this picture. Need to smile more.  Better bigger. Connected on a whole other level.  Would die for you. Almost died with you. Made me smile till 4am.  Popular.  LA surprise. Feeling a strong bond between us through our disorder. Caring the same back. MY backbone. Love you forever.


You and Jon in Bristol.  AHA! Alan partridge.  Simpson's. 'FAT!' Filaments. Funny car! Agincourt. 'scardy bus face!' Taking about e-numbers and ANTS in the garage! Ascot racecourse. Magnetic nipple lights! The pub! Being naughty. Laughing at Jon! :)


Incredibly Lucky to have you hold me through this tough time.  Incredible parents. Still in love.  Fought through.  Proud. So proud.  Holding hands at the zoo.  Almost crying. Watching in admiration. Big smiles on your faces.  Puppy love again. Simply adorable.  xo

About 3 years ago i did a piece of artwork at college..the theme was disorders.. I decided after keeping a secret for many years about my ana/mia to put it on canvas.. It was my way of telling the world without actually telling them.. It was so weird doing it and pouring every ounce of my own truth/pain/reality into my art and having everyone look at it. I was chosen to exhibit it and i declined. I was told if i didnt exhibit it i'd lose a grade.. I didnt care. I couldnt handle the idea of people critizing it or telling me what they didnt think i captured or how wrong i was or even how right i was about the reflection of the disorder upon my work.. Can you imagine how that would have felt? Anyway. This is what i came up with... On the canvas there is a picture of food. The words on that image is actually a real extract from my diary.. It couldnt get any more real than that...

New Page 1

Well again i am home from SAN FRANCISCO! It was a lot of fun.. took 11 hours to drive instead of 8 because my friend drove on the wrong freeway! Got to stay in the four seasons for free for 3 nights because she works at the one here in san diego. This hotel is a feckin' joke! We turned up with no makeup, hair in a messy bun, pajamas and no socks half asleep and incapable of conversation! The bellboys smiled politely. I was right in the centre where union square is, the mall, nordies rack, marshalls, ross, h&m!! urban outfitters, lohemans! many many more! BUT i didnt get too many pics because 80% of people we walked by where sketchy or begging and i didnt feel so safe.. So here ya go a few snapshots from my lil holiday! :)

Me and Rhawnie Flew to hawaii a few weeks ago! Im terrible at taking photos because i forget my camera when im hungover. I forgot it a lot this holiday.. :D Hawaii is a dream come true. One of the best places ive been so far! We got a GREAT hotel for only $69.99 a night and it was 1 min from the beach. We were right in the middle of town with shops, bars, clubs and restaurants! It was gorgeously hot and the ocean was crystal blue! Getting there we had to take a flight to salt lake first! I was treated like absolute shite at the airport because they thought i had drugs in my bag.. Turns out rhawnies bag had smelt like weed cuz shes had weed in it before. After about an hour of humiliation and degrading behaviour towards me they gave me the bag and said i was free to go. I looked at the dude and said that that was not my bag, my bag was the white one and he flipped out on me saying how i lied about which bag was mine.. WTF?! I said he didnt even ask me which bag was mine and that i was just thrown around from security guard to another, but he kept on saying never to lie again! I was soo hurt and mad! Turns out rhawnie got away scot free and im the poor sod who gets felt up, questioned and humiliated! On the way home from the trip they thought i had drugs in my flipflops because they are made with some sort of metallic fabric and it sparked off the detector! I had to sit down and be felt up all over again! Anyhoo! Trip was fantastic and i miss it sooo much!! :) xo

At the beach!

At MACYS being dorks!

why did you guys make me watch the premiere of 24!?  now look what you have done! Good bye monday nights! hello 24!

John Cleese's Letter to the USA 

To the citizens of the United States of America, in light of your failure to elect a competent President of the USA and thus to govern yourselves, we hereby give notice of the revocation of your independence, effective today. 

Her Sovereign Majesty Queen Elizabeth II resumes monarchical duties over all states, commonwealths and other territories. Except Utah, which she does not fancy. 

Your new prime minister (The Right Honourable Tony Blair, MP for the 97.8% of you who have, until now, been unaware there's a world outside your borders) will appoint a Minister for America. Congress and the Senate are disbanded. A questionnaire circulated next year will determine whether any of you noticed. 

To aid your transition to a British Crown Dependency, the following rules are introduced with immediate effect: 

1. Look up "revocation" in the Oxford English Dictionary. Check "aluminium" in the pronunciation guide. You will be amazed at just how wrongly you pronounce it. The letter 'U' will be reinstated in words such as 'favour' and 'neighbour'. Likewise you will learn to spell 'doughnut' without skipping half the letters. Generally, you should raise your vocabulary to acceptable levels. Look up "vocabulary." 

Using the same twenty seven words interspersed with filler noises such as "like" and "you know" is an unacceptable and inefficient form of communication. Look up "interspersed." There will be no more 'bleeps' in the Jerry Springer show. If you're not old enough to cope with bad language then you should not have chat shows. 

2. There is no such thing as "U.S. English." We'll let Microsoft know on your behalf. The Microsoft spell-checker will be adjusted to take account of the reinstated letter 'u'. 

3. You should learn to distinguish English and Australian accents. It really isn't that hard. English accents are not limited to cockney, upper-class twit or Mancunian (Daphne in Frasier). Scottish dramas such as 'Taggart' will no longer be broadcast with subtitles.You must learn that there is no such place as Devonshire in England. The name of the county is "Devon." If you persist in calling it Devonshire, all American States will become "shires" e.g. Texasshire Floridashire, Louisianashire. 

4. You should relearn your original national anthem, "God Save The Queen", but only after fully carrying out task 1. 

5. You should stop playing American "football." There's only one kind of football. What you call American "football" is not a very good game. The 2.1% of you aware there is a world outside your borders may have noticed no one else plays "American" football. You should instead play proper football. Initially, it would be best if you played with the girls. 

Those of you brave enough will, in time, be allowed to play rugby (which is similar to American "football", but does not involve stopping for a rest every twenty seconds or wearing full kevlar body armour like nancies). 

You should stop playing baseball. It's not reasonable to host an event called the 'World Series' for a game which is not played outside of America. Instead of baseball, you will be allowed to play a girls' game called "rounders," which is baseball without fancy team stripe, oversized gloves, collector cards or hotdogs. 

6. You will no longer be allowed to own or carry guns, or anything more dangerous in public than a vegetable peeler. Because you are not sensible enough to handle potentially dangerous items, you need a permit to carry a vegetable peeler. 

7. July 4th is no longer a public holiday. November 2nd will be a new national holiday. It will be called "Indecisive Day." 

8. All American cars are hereby banned. They are crap and it is for your own good. When we show you German cars, you will understand what we mean. All road intersections will be replaced with roundabouts, and you will start driving on the left. At the same time, you will go metric without the benefit of conversion tables. Roundabouts and metrication will help you understand the British sense of humour. 

9. Learn to make real chips. Those things you call French fries are not real chips. Fries aren't French, they're Belgian though 97.8% of you (including the guy who discovered fries while in Europe) are not aware of a country called Belgium. Potato chips are properly called "crisps." Real chips are thick cut and fried in animal fat. The traditional accompaniment to chips is beer which should be served warm and flat. 

10. The cold tasteless stuff you call beer is actually lager. Only proper British Bitter will be referred to as "beer." Substances once known as "American Beer" will henceforth be referred to as "Near-Frozen Gnat's Urine," except for the product of the American Budweiser company which will be called "Weak Near-Frozen Gnat's Urine." This will allow true Budweiser (as manufactured for the last 1000 years in Pilsen, Czech Republic) to be sold without risk of confusion. 

11. The UK will harmonise petrol prices (or "Gasoline," as you will be permitted to keep calling it) for those of the former USA, adopting UK petrol prices (roughly $6/US gallon, get used to it). 

12. Learn to resolve personal issues without guns, lawyers or therapists. That you need many lawyers and therapists shows you're not adult enough to be independent. If you're not adult enough to sort things out without suing someone or speaking to a therapist, you're not grown up enough to handle a gun. 

13. Please tell us who killed JFK. It's been driving us crazy. 

14. Tax collectors from Her Majesty's Government will be with you shortly to ensure the acquisition of all revenues due (backdated to 1776). 

Thank you for your co-operation. 

* John Cleese 
[Basil Fawlty, Fawlty Towers, Torquay, Devon, England]

Why do i need to be self destructive when i can put the same energy into crying? i need to fight this temptation but the words he says hurt sooo bad and the truth he denies hurts even worse.  I dont know why im so angry but i want to throw up the pain so bad.....SO fucking bad.

"whenever you look at yourself in a mirror from now on you are required to smile; the world sure is smiling when they look at you." ...someone posted that anonymously a while ago.. i wish i knew who it was. It was really cute.

I need to stop this.  If my parents pushed me to go back into hospital i might not even try too hard to fight it.  If i had food in my stomach right now id throw it all up.  I wouldnt stop until i scratched the back of my throat.  I always knew if i got a swollen throat by the end of the week i was doing a good job of starving...  Every so often when i get moments like this one i want to throw up, but i never have food in my stomach at the time and im not one to eat food in order too... And here i am thinking i eat too much and feel fatter everyday.  I feel soo huge.  I feel like im overweight.  I feel like im drenched in disgusting fat.  I feel like im going back to my old weight.. Oh god i couldnt..i cant even imagine....  UH i just hate the way i feel and i feel it way to often.  Im so dangerous at these times.  I feel destructive.  Like i want nothing more then to put my body through hell.  Im laying in bed on this friday night at 9pm because i didnt want to go out and be 'seen'.  I still havent quite figured out why.. I guess i look at it through my eyes and i dont wanna see me, so why would anyone else?  Perhaps that is my problem..  Oh get me out of this horrible place inside my head.  Im so sick to death of it.
The most beautiful body...

I am feeling incredibly out-of-control. Eating, exorsizing, my state of mind.  I feel like i cant control anything at the moment and being so afraid of losing control i am taking it out on myself in relapse.  Right now i have a very strong intention to lose 10 pounds as soon as i can just to place myself in [what feels like] control.  I know this would put me at a weight that would be 'technically' to low, but to me, at this moment, nothing is to low.
I dont lose weight fast anymore.  It used to drop off me..on and on until i reached a horrible plateu of 115 to 118 on a daily basis.  Today i was almost 120 and i couldnt stop crying.. To be governed by a number is irrational.  I am fully aware i am irrational. I wish people would stop trying to make me realise this.  I am so hungry.  I need to eat.  I am TERRIFIED to eat.  I want to avoid food for weeks.  I know i cant.  I know i cant go out without food and that cuts out my social life, which i also need.     Im stuck in a rut.  I need some guidance.  I need some help.  I need somebody to hold me up and tell me what to do and to eat and when and how much.  I need to learn how to lose weight the right way, before i learn that being small does not make me any less of a victim.  I make myself the victim, not the number on the scale.  I am very confused.  I want to scream.  I want to cry.  I want to eat.

This is for chris + Marc + Dan + Andes!  Check this out:   http://www.oceanic-air.com/
apparently its the mock airline website for the tv's  [LOST] and theres tonnes of hidden scary messages in it-you have to type in various things- look it up on google for more details!  It is just on the radio - for like an hour they were running through these crazy things they are finding on this site!  people calling in and helping them suss out things!  Its pretty crazy.  I might have to watch it now....

Everytime i watch documentaries on bullied kids and school shootings i get very emotional.  Just watched an interview with a kid who shot some kids at his school after losing it.. He described how he stabbed his mom to death and when asked why, he started to cry lots and mumbled between cries, 'because she would never lve me-she just never loved me..'  it was so sad..  I cried a lot. I think, for me, the love i have from my parents has kept me alive  I am very other directed and i survive solely on the love of others.  [a problem that i need to work on] If i was cut off emotionally from those i love the most- i wouldnt wake in the monring. I feel torn because i know im empathetic but i also know the act itself is selfish, but for some reason, i can completely understand the desperation to fight a situation/explode emotionally.  The kids a kid..Theres only so much pain tolerance..  If i could, i'd cuddle that kid and let him cry on my shoulder, then i'd try and walk away...                <3
You are the sweetest person in the world.
wow.. just burnt 750 kcals at the gym and i feel wonderful!  i even walked away by myself instead of doing 1000 kcals like the 'ol days!  im trying/testing my control ;) yayahhh!
<s>If you'd just stop hurting me i would'nt have to keep throwing up. </s>

I feel really uncomfortable.  It is times like this that i completely understand why i got myself into such a mess and wound up in that horrible hospital.       I am completely other-directed and i need to address that instead of denying it everyday.      If i dont feel wanted, appreciated, loved or even admired i fall apart.   I mean, really...broken.   Right now i feel nothing but inappropriate.  Out of place, forgotten.        I want to make the kind of friends that call me for no reason.  Friends that miss me after not seeing me for a week.   Friends who dont care where we end up hanging out because its the company that drives us to hang out.      I have been here 2 years and cannot think of a single friend who has been consistant. I crave the stability of others.  The positiveness.  The loyal, trusting, open armed friendship that i dream of day in day out...  Friends who are as into me as i am, them.  I will never be able to change the way i view others.  I will always love you way more then i should to start with.  And i will always be dissapointed.  I just hope soon...really soon, i wont have to be...       

<center>Call me.</center>

I just want to cry so bad right now. Im trying to think of other things but i cant seem to shake off this really intense feeling of utter repulsion.  I feel like i am drowning in fat and uglyness and no matter what i do to distract myself i have this documented image of myself stained in my mind and it wont go away. I cant believe i feel this ugly.  I cant believe after all i have been through, with the disorders, weight loss and what not that i feel as fat, ugly and grotesque as ever before.  I feel sick to my stomach and i feel nauseous.       I hate medication.  i hate coming off it.  I hate having to come off it.  I hate having to have ever started it.    I dont know how to deal with this shit without it.   I CANT BREATHE

Hyponatremia (related to "water-loading") - as stated above, electrolytes are essential to proper body functioning. Drinking too much water (more than eight, eight-ounce glasses in less than twelve hours), can cause Hyponatremia (not enough sodium in the blood), especially in someone already malnurished or dehydrated. Hyponatremia can cause fluid in the lungs, the brain to swell, nauseousness, vomiting, confusion and even death. 

And there i was thinking drinking 7 bottles of 'propel' a day was a great, encouraging idea to hydrate myself because i found it impossible to drink just plain water.  

I am going to get a check up tommorow and i am scared.  It is just one thing after another.

The more pounds i lose, the more i feel like ive gained.

I cannot rationalise, no matter how much i want.
What a cruel illness.  I can never win.

ok, so as a follow up from the latest loss of our wonderful doggy, joey, i have seen what servere loss looks like and feels like. When i say servere, i say it because i have never seen such distress in the eyes of my family before and i never want to see it again.  I guess what i am trying to say is i have started to put more value on my life.  I've seen what loss can do to the people i love the most.  The people i actually continue with my recovery for, solely.   I think i've now put a higher value on my own life.  I dont want to make them worry anymore than they already do.  Death is so final and real.  I think holding him in my arms and staring death in its eyes has made me wake up. 
And right now, after doing my usual, nuts,coffee and diet coke excuse for a diet i am very shaky and my blood pressure is high [obviously] and im more scared then i've ever been about my health.  I hope this is a good sign.  I am taking a lot of vitamins and I just nervously drank straight from my bathroom tap to calm the dizzyness.  Joey, you opened my eyes and my baby i'll miss you, whereever you are.  

I forgive you for shredding all my underwear. xx

So these last two days have been spent mostly asleep.  I cannot seem to stay awake and every muscle in my body is asleep..  Last night marlo dragged me to the bar and i spent most the night sleeping on her shoulder ;)  Today i have not moved from this couch and every 3 hours i wake up and check my ebay and snoop livejournal.  My dad thinks my electrolytes are out of sync - but i know he is paranoid.  I have not thrown up in a week now and so i know thats not to blame.  I have spent the last 3 weeks eating nuts and fish to give myself protein, but in exchange i have restricted other foods.  I think my mind is playing tricks on me.  I've been cheeky by mixing brekkie and lunch together so i infact, only eat one meal between the two and for dinner i usually claim to have 'eaten all day and im to anxious to eat dinner' but i know deep down that it is not true.  Its strange to be in control but then, be so out of control..  I've had half a cup of porridge with splenda, a salad with some pine nuts in it and a 20 kcal lolly and a handful of grapes and apparently thats completely justifying my reasoning behind not eating dinner tonite.  I know its crazy.  I know it, but why if i know it am i still convinced?  It is so strange to have two opposing opinions stored right next to eachother.  Oh, nevermind, im sleepy again..
